chapter.title: Detail View
chapter.para: If only a single record satisfies your search criteria, a detail view of this record is shown. If several records are found and you click one of them in the list view, the detail view for the record in question is shown.
In the detail view, you can see in which folder the record is located, its "Record Location".
The buttons displayed reflect what you can do.

listitem.para: You can access the XML view of the record in question, that is the "raw" XML view of the MODS record, with all information enclosed by tags.

chapter.para: The detail view shows most of the contents of the records. The XML view shows the unabridged view of a record. This is the data that Tamboti works with. If you have saved a number of records and export them, the export format is also raw XML. You can import the MODS XML record into most other reference management software.

Applications like EndNote and Zotero can import this format (in Citavi, this import function is still under development). This means that you can work with the records you find in Tamboti in ordinary desktop applications and (with Zotero) in the browser, integrating them in your papers.
